channel.title: Simple Recipes
channel.description: A no ads, no nonsense simple cooking website featuring recipes everyone can make.

description.p: Published a new recipe - Finnish blueberry pie.
Also made some changes to website's CSS style sheet to make it easier to maintain and cleaned up some messy code.
Additionally, rewrote some bits of my zucchini pancakes recipe, nothing major or significant though.
Aaand some other minor technical fixes here and there...
Additionally, I prettied up this RSS feed text formatting a bit.
Implemented some minor improvements and fixes for the website.
All external links now open in a new browser window.
Adding to this, also changed the 88x31 button's code that was meant for embedding so that when a user clicks on it, it opens the link in a new window as well.
This website was created on November 20th, 2024, hurray! It's built purely with HTML and CSS and with the help of HUGO website generator. Happy cooking and website making everyone!!!
